definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: and in the grounds around gardens, bowers, fountains and shady nooks in profusion.
sentences.chinese: 花園，涼亭，噴泉圍繞的場地以及納涼處，應有盡有。

sentences.english: Lighting can focus on a gazebo, garden architectural feature, or archway.
sentences.chinese: 燈光能夠專注於一個涼亭，園林的建築特色，或牌坊。

sentences.english: An elegant summerhouse where you can find tranquility in a hustling surrounding.
sentences.chinese: 鬧中取靜的涼亭頗有幾分雅緻。

sentences.english: There is summer house inside, swimming-pool, garden, gymnastical equipment.
sentences.chinese: 內有涼亭，泅水池，花圃，健身器材。

sentences.english: Rain Pavilion, beauty of Hosta, so harmonious.
sentences.chinese: 風雨涼亭，美人玉簪，卻如此和諧。

sentences.english: Gawk at it in the town gazebo.
sentences.chinese: 在城鎮的涼亭裏呆呆的看着它。

sentences.english: Benedick was quietly seated reading in an arbour.
sentences.chinese: 培尼狄克靜靜地坐在涼亭裏看書。

sentences.english: She crosses the loggia and quickly enters the house.
sentences.chinese: 她穿過涼亭，迅速走進屋內。

sentences.english: A masonry base wall gives a gazebo a solidly formal appearance, for instance.
sentences.chinese: 阿砌石牆基給出了涼亭穩固的正式出臺，例如。

sentences.english: The assembly place is Qingci Park by Da Min pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 集合地點是清池公園的大涼亭旁。

sentences.english: Through primrose tufts, in that sweet bower.
sentences.chinese: 穿過櫻草草皮，在那甜美涼亭裏頭。

sentences.english: Mubai and Xiulian are sitting together in a pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 慕白和秀蓮一起坐在涼亭裏。

sentences.english: Pavilion—Short Poems by Ceng Xin was published in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 泰國詩人曾心中英雙語短詩集《涼亭》於泰國出版。

sentences.english: Behind them the summerhouse and gazebo were already ablaze.
sentences.chinese: 在他們身後，涼亭已經閃起了火光。

sentences.english: The Keller homestead, where the family lived, was a few steps from our little rose-bower.
sentences.chinese: 凱勒家的宅第距我們家的玫瑰小涼亭只有幾步之遙。

definition: Tuku town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
see 林陰大道|林阴大道[lin2 yin1 da4 dao4]
flight of steps/(fig.) a means of advancement/stepping stone
